questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Ariane at the entrance to the Heart of Gielinor and enter the Elder Halls. (Chat ✓•1)
Talk to Charos. Go through all chat options about what to do with the eggs. (Chat 1•2•3•4•5•4)
Talk to Azzanadra, after which a cutscene will play. (Chat ~)
Talk to Charos and Ariane. (Chat ~)
Go to the Archaeology Guild, upstairs onto the balcony. Talk to Dr Nabanik. (Chat ~)
Teleport to Port Sarim lodestone and go to Armadyl's tower. Climb to the top and talk to Armadyl.
itemsRecommended: Use the Clan Vexillum to teleport to the Falador Clan Camp if you are in a clan.

questSteps.stepDescription: Go to Burthorpe Castle and climb up the stone staircase. (Chat 1)
Talk to Icthlarin.
Talk to Seren.
Talk to Moia. (Chat 1)
Talk to Zamorak. (Chat 2)
Go to the throne room on the 3rd floor[US] of the White Knights' Castle in Falador and talk to Saradomin.
Return to Dr Nabanik on the balcony of the main building at the Archaeology Guild.
Enter the City of Senntisten through the ancient door to the north of the Archaeology Guild.(Chat 1)
itemsRecommended: Signs of the porter or grace of the elves for banking archaeological materials
additionalStepInformation: See the map at this step to reference to for items, statues and other needs.

questSteps.stepDescription: Excavate the forum entrance.
Interact with the pedestal to obtain Pontifex Maximus figurine (damaged)
Exit pulley (Chat 1). Talk to Intern Jimmy at the entrance to get materials.
Restore the artefact at an archaeologist's workbench. (The one south by the guild is closest.)
Return to Azzanadra, and interact with the pedestal to place the artefact upon it.
Follow Azzanadra to the cathedral, and speak with him. (You may go directly to the cathedral and wait for him.) (Chat 5)
additionalStepInformation: Alternatively, you can turn off run and click on him once, following him all the way to the cathedral.

questSteps.stepDescription: Search the bookcases, chests, crates, and pews in the cathedral, including the upstairs balconies, for two light globes (see map below).
Talk to Azzanadra.
Pass through the western cathedral door.
See the map for ward and objective locations.
additionalStepInformation: Within the city, put light globes on the light pedestals to illuminate the immediate area.
When outside of an illuminated area, you will receive stacks of Shadows of the Empire debuff.
The more stacks you have, the more damage you are dealt.
Standing in an illuminated area will remove stacks of the debuff.
This includes stepping into houses with lights. the ward only dims the light from the globes.
Light globes will persist when teleporting out and additional light globes are spread through the west district of the city.
You don't need to obtain all light globes to complete the quest, so it may be more beneficial to juggle them as you explore new areas.

questSteps.stepDescription: Head to the blood bank (north-western building in southern section).
Inspect the blood bottle by the interior door leading to the blood ward.
Search the old desk.
Search the pile of books on the table near the entrance.
Head north to the marketplace and enter the southern house south of the colosseum gateway.
additionalStepInformation: The correct house is marked with Bloodied Note on the map.

questSteps.stepDescription: Search the ransacked desk near the chimney for the Blood Bank Ledger.
Return to the blood bank.
Search the shelves for bottles of blood Bottles of blood are listed in Additional Info.
additionalStepInformation: Bottle of blood (human)
Bottle of blood (unicorn)
Bottle of blood (dragon)
Bottle of blood (aviansie)
Be prepared for a dangerous boss fight immediately after finishing the puzzle.
The Blood Warden will heal from any damage-over-time abilities. Additionally, its special attack will cause it to heal over time.

questSteps.stepDescription: Inspect the blood bottle to start the puzzle, and add blood Blood amounts are in Additional Info. Be prepared to fight and kill the Blood Warden.
additionalStepInformation: 2/8 human blood
3/8 unicorn blood
1/8 dragon blood
2/8 aviansie blood

questSteps.stepDescription: Take the ward from the pedestal.
Activate the blood bottle near the door to exit.
Talk to Azzanadra with the ward. (Chat 1)
Go down two flights of stairs from the cathedral.
Take the ice ward from the pedestal.
Talk to Azzanadra with the ward. (Chat 1)
Ensure you have enough healing ability with you as you will take a lot of damage while returning the shadow ward. Each open house is to lower said stacks of damage.
Go to the northern-most building, where the ward is located, and head upstairs.
Take the journal on the desk to get the Inquisition Profiles and read the Inquisition Profiles and complete the dialogue. (Chat 1)
Open the marked drawers as seen in the image at this step also added map at this step. Start from the bottom and work your way up or zoom in for ease.
Head downstairs and take the ward from the pedestal.
Return to Azzanadra as fast as possible. Be prepared to take a lot of damage. Using a powerburst of acceleration will make this easier.
Talk to Azzanadra with the ward. (Chat 1)
The smoke ward can be found in the large building directly south of the ice ward on the map. As you approach an animation with gargoyle sentinels should play.

Find and smash the stones to reveal the gargoyles sentinels. Smash them manually to complete the final blow, or automatically if relevant perk is available. Locations of Gargoyles are in Additional Information.
additionalStepInformation: Directly outside the arsenal, the building with the ward.
Further west and south of the first, in a clearing in front of a house door.
To the north in the market, the square containing the market stalls.
West of the market, slightly south of the colosseum gateway.

questSteps.stepDescription: Return to the arsenal and take the ward from the pedestal.
Talk to Azzanadra with the ward. (Chat 1)
Talk to Azzanadra and complete the dialogue.
Quest Complete!
